purpose: Enable the automation of web-based tasks using a Gym-like environment
principle: Builds on OpenAI's Gym framework to simulate web environments for training automation agents
reusability: Designed as a framework that can be extended with custom web automation tasks; supports integration with reinforcement learning models
limitations: Primarily focused on web environments, may not support non-web automation tasks; in alpha stage, so features may change
